isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - RADIATOR SHUTTER ENABLE (RSE) - FUNCTION

svcproc.title: FUNCTION
svcproc.para: The purpose of Radiator Shutter Enable feature is to provide the proper logic to open or close the radiator shutters (energize or de-energize a solenoid). Closing the shutters will keep the engine warm during cold weather operation. This will provide faster warm up of the passenger cab thereby enabling faster defrost of the windshield.
